lead_paragraph: The bulldozers will arrive at Wentworth next month as organizers begin their bid to restore the BMW PGA Championship venue to its former glory, European Tour supremo Keith Pelley said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Wentworth Going Back to Original Design, Says Tour Chief
headline.main: Wentworth Going Back to Original Design, Says Tour Chief
